src:
4 Wakil Indonesia Lolos 1/4 Final, Ini Hasil Lengkap Fuzhou China Open
07 Nov 2019, 18:43 by Danang Sundoro



4 Wakil Indonesia Lolos 1/4 Final, Ini Hasil Lengkap Fuzhou China Open



4 Wakil Indonesia Lolos 1/4 Final, Ini Hasil Lengkap Fuzhou China Open



4 Wakil Indonesia Lolos 1/4 Final, Ini Hasil Lengkap Fuzhou China Open



4 Wakil Indonesia Lolos 1/4 Final, Ini Hasil Lengkap Fuzhou China Open


KBRN, Fuzhou : Indonesia meloloskan empat wakil ke babak perempat final Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 di stadion Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Kamis (7/11/2019) Petang.BACA JUGA : Marcus/Kevin Melaju 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019Keempat Wakil merah putih yang lolos ke perempat final, adalah ganda putra Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo/Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, disusul ganda campuran Praveen Jordan/Melati Daeva Oktavianti, ganda putra Hendra Setiawan/Mohammad Ahsan dan Jonatan Christie di tunggal putra. BACA JUGA : Praveen/Melati Lolos Ke Perempat Final Fuzhou China Open 201Sektor tunggal putra Indonesia satu satunya, Jonatan lolos harus berjuang keras menundukkan pebulutangkis Hong Kong Lee Cheuk Yiu dengan skor 21-8, 12-21, 21-14. “Di game kedua saya merasa kurang siap, karena di game pertama menang dengan skor yang jauh. Tempo main game pertama pun beda sama di game kedua. Mungkin di game pertama lawan terkendala angin juga, ini yang saya alami di game kedua,” kata Jonatan usai laga dalam keterangan tertulis dari PP.PBSI kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Kamis (7/11/2019) Petang.“Saya sempat ragu-ragu di game kedua karena banyak pukulan saya yang tidak pas. Di game ketiga, saya lebih paham lagi, dan lebih siap saat pindah lapangan. Bagaimana menyesuaikan dengan kondisi di lapangan,” lanjut pemain rangking tujuh dunia ini. Di babak perempat final, Jonatan akan menghadapi Anders Antonsen dari Denmark. Tercatat, Jumat (8/11/2019) besok menjadi pertemuan keempat bagi kedua pemain terbaik dunia, Jonatan versus Anders dengan kedudukan sementara 2-1. “Kami sudah sama-sama capek, karena sudah ikut turnamen beruntun dan hari ini pun dia tandingnya ramai, saya juga main tiga game. Sebisa mungkin saya harus balikin kondisi, ototnya harus dijaga. Bolanya di sini lambat dan ada kalah-menang angin, jadi besok harus pintar-pintar terapkan pola main, lebih bisa gunakan stroke-nya,” jelas Jonatan. Sayangnya, sektor ganda campuran Rinov Rivaldy/Pitha Haningtyas Mentari dikalahkan wakil Malaysia, Goh Soon Huat/Shevon Jemie Lai, dengan skor 21-23, 13-21.Babak perempat final Fuzhou China Open 2019 akan dilangsungkan besok, Jumat (8/11/2019), mulai pukul 12.00 waktu Fuzhou.(Keterangan Foto : PP.PBSI)
text:
4 Representatives of Indonesia Passed 1/4 Final, Here are the Complete Results of Fuzhou China Open
Nov 7 2019, 18:43 by Danang Sundoro



4 Representatives of Indonesia Passed 1/4 Final, Here are the Complete Results of Fuzhou China Open



4 Representatives of Indonesia Passed 1/4 Final, Here are the Complete Results of Fuzhou China Open



4 Representatives of Indonesia Passed 1/4 Final, Here are the Complete Results of Fuzhou China Open



4 Representatives of Indonesia Passed 1/4 Final, Here are the Complete Results of Fuzhou China Open


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesia passed four representatives to the quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center stadium on Thursday (11/07/2019) Evening. READ ALSO: Marcus / Kevin Advancing 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019 The red-and-white representatives who qualified for the quarter-finals, were men's doubles Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo / Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, followed by mixed doubles Praveen Jordan / Melati Daeva Oktavianti, men's doubles Hendra Setiawan / Mohammad Ahsan and Jonatan Christie in men's singles. READ ALSO: Praveen / Jasmine Escapes to the Quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 201The only Indonesian men's singles, Jonatan escaped had to fight hard to beat Hong Kong's badminton player Lee Cheuk Yiu with a score of 21-8, 12-21, 21-14. "In the second game I felt I was not ready, because in the first game I won with a far score. The tempo of playing the first game was the same in the second game. Maybe in the first game the opponent was constrained by wind too, this is what I experienced in the second game, "Jonatan said after the match in a written statement from PP.PBSI to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Thursday (11/07/2019) Evening." I had time hesitant in the second game because a lot of my punches don't fit. In the third game, I was more understanding, and more ready when I moved the field. How to adjust to the conditions on the field, "continued the world number seven player. In the quarter-finals, Jonatan will face Anders Antonsen from Denmark. Noted, Friday (11/08/2019) tomorrow will be the fourth meeting for the two best players in the world, Jonatan versus Anders with a temporary position of 2-1. "We are both tired, because we have participated in successive tournaments and today he has a very busy match, I also played three games. As much as possible I have to reverse the condition, the muscles must be maintained. The ball here is slow and there is a win-win wind, so tomorrow must be smart to apply the playing pattern, more able to use the stroke, "explained Jonatan. Unfortunately, the mixed double sector Rinov Rivaldy / Pitha Haningtyas Mentari was defeated by Malaysian representative, Goh Soon Huat / Shevon Jemie Lai, with a score of 21-23, 13-21. The quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 will take place tomorrow, Friday (8/11 / 2019), starting at 12.00 Fuzhou time. (Photo caption: PP.PBSI)
